biography_text: COLLINS, Chris, a Representative from New York; born in Schenectady, Schenectady County, N.Y., May 20, 1950; B.S., North Carolina State University, Raleigh, N.C., 1972; M.B.A., University of Alabama, Birmingham, Ala., 1975; businessman; Erie County, N.Y. executive, 2007-2011; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Sixth Congress in 1998; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: North Carolina State University, Raleigh, N.C.
